dataStructures

Class GroupDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataStructures.GroupDescriptor

  • public class GroupDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the GroupDescriptor It extracts the Inode table pointer value from the group descriptor of each block in the filesystem.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor.

      This method prints all data extracted from the group descriptor onto the terminal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupDescriptor

        public GroupDescriptor(byte[] b,
                       int adr,
                       int id)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        b - An array of bytes which belong to the group descriptor of a block in the filesystem.
        adr - The address of this group descriptor (integer).
        id - The ID of the group block which this group descriptor belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • readGroupDescriptor

        public void readGroupDescriptor(int i)
        This method extracts the inode table pointer value from the group descriptor.

        Accesor Method. This method retrieves address of this group descriptor.

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Accesor Method. This method retrieves the number of the block this group descriptor belongs to.
        Returns:
        The number of the block this group descriptor belongs to.

      • printAllData

        public void printAllData()
        This method prints all data extracted from the group descriptor onto the terminal.
